## âš¡ï¸ å¿«é€Ÿå…¥é–€

```go
package main

import "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("Hello, World ğŸ‘‹!")
    })

    app.Listen(":3000")
}
```

## ğŸ’¡ è¨­è¨ˆå“²å­¸

å¾ [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/about/) è½‰åˆ° [Go](https://go.dev/doc/) çš„æ–°é€² Go é–‹ç™¼è€…ï¼Œå¾—å…ˆé¢å° Go çš„å„ç¨®çŸ¥è­˜é»ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½é–‹å§‹å»ºæ§‹è‡ªå·±çš„ Web æ‡‰ç”¨ç¨‹å¼æˆ–å¾®æœå‹™ã€‚Fiber ä½œç‚ºä¸€æ¬¾ **Web æ¡†æ¶**ï¼Œè¨­è¨ˆä¹‹åˆä¾¿ä»¥ **æ¥µç°¡ä¸»ç¾©** ç‚ºç†å¿µï¼Œä¸¦éµå¾ª **UNIX ä¹‹é“**ï¼Œè®“æ–°é€² Go é–‹ç™¼è€…èƒ½å¤ å¿«é€Ÿéš¨è‘—å‹å–„ä¸”å€¼å¾—ä¿¡è³´çš„ç¤¾ç¾¤ï¼Œé€²å…¥ Go çš„ä¸–ç•Œã€‚

Fiber **å•Ÿç™¼è‡ª** Expressâ€”â€”ç¶²éš›ç¶²è·¯ä¸Šæœ€çŸ¥åçš„ Web æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å°‡ Express çš„ **æ˜“ç”¨æ€§** å’Œ Go çš„ **åŸå§‹æ•ˆèƒ½** çµåˆåœ¨ä¸€èµ·ã€‚å¦‚æœæ‚¨æ›¾ç¶“åœ¨ Node.jsï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨ Express æˆ–é¡ä¼¼æ¡†æ¶ï¼‰å¯¦ä½œé Web æ‡‰ç”¨ç¨‹å¼ï¼Œé‚£éº¼è¨±å¤šæ–¹æ³•å’Œé–‹ç™¼æº–å‰‡ï¼Œå°‡è®“æ‚¨æ„Ÿåˆ° **ç„¡æ¯”ç†Ÿæ‚‰**ã€‚

æˆ‘å€‘ **å‚¾è½** ä½¿ç”¨è€…åœ¨ [Issues](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues)ã€Discord [ç¾¤çµ„](https://gofiber.io/discord) å’Œ **ç¶²è·¯ä¸Šä»»ä½•è§’è½** çš„æ„è¦‹å’Œå»ºè­°ï¼Œè£½ä½œå‡º **å¿«é€Ÿ**ã€**éˆæ´»** ä¸” **æ˜“æ–¼ä¸Šæ‰‹** çš„ Go Web æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œä¾†æ‡‰å°**ä»»ä½•**å·¥ä½œã€**ç¹³ä»¶æœŸé™**ä»¥åŠé–‹ç™¼è€…çš„**èƒ½åŠ›å€é–“**â€”â€”å¦‚åŒ Express åœ¨ JavaScript ä¸–ç•Œæ‰€æ‰®æ¼”çš„è§’è‰²ä¸€æ¨£ï¼

## âš ï¸ é™åˆ¶

-   ç”±æ–¼ Fiber æœ‰ç”¨åˆ° Unsafeï¼Œæœ¬å‡½å¼åº«æœ‰æ™‚å¯èƒ½ç„¡æ³•ç›¸å®¹æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆçš„ Go èªè¨€ã€‚Fiber 2.40.0 å·²åœ¨ Go 1.17 è‡³ 1.21 çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬æ¸¬è©¦éã€‚
-   Fiber ä¸ç›¸å®¹ net/http çš„ä»‹é¢ï¼Œæ„å‘³è‘—æ‚¨ç„¡æ³•ä½¿ç”¨åƒæ˜¯ gqlgenã€go-swagger æˆ–å…¶ä»–ä»»ä½•å±¬æ–¼ net/http ç”Ÿæ…‹ç³»çµ±çš„å°ˆæ¡ˆã€‚

## ğŸ‘€ ç¯„ä¾‹

ä¸‹æ–¹åˆ—å‡ºä¸€äº›å¸¸è¦‹ç¯„ä¾‹ã€‚å¦‚æœæ‚¨æƒ³æŸ¥çœ‹æ›´å¤šç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼Œè«‹åƒé–±æˆ‘å€‘çš„ [Recipes å„²å­˜åº«](https://github.com/gofiber/recipes)ï¼Œæˆ–å‰å¾€æˆ‘å€‘æä¾›çš„ [API æ–‡ä»¶](https://docs.gofiber.io)ã€‚

#### ğŸ“– [**åŸºç¤è·¯ç”±**](https://docs.gofiber.io/#basic-routing)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // GET /api/register
    app.Get("/api/*", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("âœ‹ %s", c.Params("*"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => âœ‹ register
    })

    // GET /flights/LAX-SFO
    app.Get("/flights/:from-:to", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ’¸ å¾ï¼š%sï¼Œåˆ°ï¼š%s", c.Params("from"), c.Params("to"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ’¸ å¾ï¼šLAXï¼Œåˆ°ï¼šSFO
    })

    // GET /dictionary.txt
    app.Get("/:file.:ext", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ“ƒ %s.%s", c.Params("file"), c.Params("ext"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ“ƒ dictionary.txt
    })

    // GET /john/75
    app.Get("/:name/:age/:gender?", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ‘´ %s å·²ç¶“ %s æ­²äº†", c.Params("name"), c.Params("age"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ‘´ john å·²ç¶“ 75 æ­²äº†
    })

    // GET /john
    app.Get("/:name", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("å“ˆå›‰ï¼Œ%s ğŸ‘‹!", c.Params("name"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => å“ˆå›‰ï¼Œjohn ğŸ‘‹!
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**è·¯ç”±å‘½å**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#name)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // GET /api/register
    app.Get("/api/*", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("âœ‹ %s", c.Params("*"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => âœ‹ register
    }).Name("api")

    data, _ := json.MarshalIndent(app.GetRoute("api"), "", "  ")
    fmt.Print(string(data))
    // æœƒè¼¸å‡ºï¼š
    // {
    //    "method": "GET",
    //    "name": "api",
    //    "path": "/api/*",
    //    "params": [
    //      "*1"
    //    ]
    // }


    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**å¯„å­˜éœæ…‹æª”æ¡ˆ**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#static)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Static("/", "./public")
    // => http://localhost:3000/js/script.js
    // => http://localhost:3000/css/style.css

    app.Static("/prefix", "./public")
    // => http://localhost:3000/prefix/js/script.js
    // => http://localhost:3000/prefix/css/style.css

    app.Static("*", "./public/index.html")
    // => http://localhost:3000/any/path/shows/index/html

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**ä¸­ä»‹æ¨¡çµ„å’Œæ¥çºŒå‡½å¼ (Next)**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#next)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // ç¬¦åˆä»»ä½•è·¯ç”±
    app.Use(func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        fmt.Println("ğŸ¥‡ ç¬¬ä¸€å€‹è™•ç†å¸¸å¼")
        return c.Next()
    })

    // ç¬¦åˆæ‰€æœ‰ /api é–‹é ­çš„è·¯ç”±
    app.Use("/api", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        fmt.Println("ğŸ¥ˆ ç¬¬äºŒå€‹è™•ç†å¸¸å¼")
        return c.Next()
    })

    // GET /api/list
    app.Get("/api/list", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        fmt.Println("ğŸ¥‰ æœ€å¾Œä¸€å€‹è™•ç†å¸¸å¼")
        return c.SendString("Hello, World ğŸ‘‹!")
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

  <summary>ğŸ“š å±•ç¤ºæ›´å¤šç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ç¯„ä¾‹</summary>

### æª¢è¦–å¼•æ“

ğŸ“– [çµ„æ…‹è¨­å®š](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/fiber#config)
ğŸ“– [å¼•æ“](https://github.com/gofiber/template)
ğŸ“– [è½‰è­¯ (render)](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#render)

è‹¥æœªæŒ‡å®šæª¢è¦–å¼•æ“ï¼ŒFiber é è¨­æ¡ç”¨ [html/template](https://pkg.go.dev/html/template/)ã€‚

å¦‚æœæ‚¨æƒ³åŸ·è¡Œéƒ¨åˆ†æª¢è¦– (partials)ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ [amber](https://github.com/eknkc/amber)ã€[handlebars](https://github.com/aymerick/raymond)ã€[mustache](https://github.com/cbroglie/mustache) æˆ– [pug](https://github.com/Joker/jade) ç­‰ç­‰ä¸åŒçš„å¼•æ“â€¦â€¦

è«‹åƒè€ƒæˆ‘å€‘çš„ [Template](https://github.com/gofiber/template) å¥—ä»¶â€”â€”å®ƒæ”¯æ´å¤šç¨®æª¢è¦–å¼•æ“ã€‚

```go
package main

import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/template/pug"
)

func main() {
    // æ‚¨å¯ä»¥åœ¨ app åˆå§‹åŒ–å‰è¨­å®šæª¢è¦– (Views) å¼•æ“ï¼š
    app := fiber.New(fiber.Config{
        Views: pug.New("./views", ".pug"),
    })

    // ç¾åœ¨ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥ç”¨ä¸‹é¢é€™ç¨®æ–¹å¼å‘¼å« `./views/home.pug` æ¨£æ¿ï¼š
    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.Render("home", fiber.Map{
            "title": "Homepage",
            "year":  1999,
        })
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### çµ„åˆè·¯ç”±éˆ

ğŸ“– [åˆ†çµ„](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#group)

```go
func middleware(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    fmt.Println("ä¸è¦ç†æˆ‘ï¼")
    return c.Next()
}

func handler(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    return c.SendString(c.Path())
}

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // æ ¹ API è·¯ç”±
    api := app.Group("/api", middleware) // /api

    // API v1 è·¯ç”±
    v1 := api.Group("/v1", middleware) // /api/v1
    v1.Get("/list", handler)           // /api/v1/list
    v1.Get("/user", handler)           // /api/v1/user

    // API v2 è·¯ç”±
    v2 := api.Group("/v2", middleware) // /api/v2
    v2.Get("/list", handler)           // /api/v2/list
    v2.Get("/user", handler)           // /api/v2/user

    // ...
}

```

### ä¸­ä»‹æ¨¡çµ„è¨˜éŒ„å™¨

### è‡ªè¨‚ 404 å›æ‡‰

ğŸ“– [HTTP æ–¹æ³•](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#status)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Static("/", "./public")

    app.Get("/demo", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("This is a demo!")
    })

    app.Post("/register", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("Welcome!")
    })

    // æœ€å¾Œä¸€å€‹ä¸­ä»‹æ¨¡çµ„ï¼Œç¬¦åˆæ‰€æœ‰æ¢ä»¶
    app.Use(func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendStatus(404)
        // => 404 "Not Found"
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### JSON å›æ‡‰

ğŸ“– [JSON](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#json)

```go
type User struct {
    Name string `json:"name"`
    Age  int    `json:"age"`
}

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Get("/user", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.JSON(&User{"John", 20})
        // => {"name":"John", "age":20}
    })

    app.Get("/json", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.JSON(fiber.Map{
            "success": true,
            "message": "Hi John!",
        })
        // => {"success":true, "message":"Hi John!"}
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### WebSocket å‡ç´š (Upgrade)

ğŸ“– [Websocket](https://github.com/gofiber/websocket)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/websocket"
)

func main() {
  app := fiber.New()

  app.Get("/ws", websocket.New(func(c *websocket.Conn) {
    for {
      mt, msg, err := c.ReadMessage()
      if err != nil {
        log.Println("read:", err)
        break
      }
      log.Printf("recv: %s", msg)
      err = c.WriteMessage(mt, msg)
      if err != nil {
        log.Println("write:", err)
        break
      }
    }
  }))

  log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
  // ws://localhost:3000/ws
}
```

### Server-Sent Events

ğŸ“– [æ›´å¤šè³‡è¨Š](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Server-sent_events/Using_server-sent_events)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/valyala/fasthttp"
)

func main() {
  app := fiber.New()

  app.Get("/sse", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    c.Set("Content-Type", "text/event-stream")
    c.Set("Cache-Control", "no-cache")
    c.Set("Connection", "keep-alive")
    c.Set("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked")

    c.Context().SetBodyStreamWriter(fasthttp.StreamWriter(func(w *bufio.Writer) {
      fmt.Println("WRITER")
      var i int

      for {
        i++
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("%d - ç›®å‰æ™‚é–“ç‚º %v", i, time.Now())
        fmt.Fprintf(w, "data: è¨Šæ¯: %s\n\n", msg)
        fmt.Println(msg)

        w.Flush()
        time.Sleep(5 * time.Second)
      }
    }))

    return nil
  })

  log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

## ğŸ§¬ å¤–æ›ä¸­ä»‹æ¨¡çµ„

é€™è£¡åˆ—å‡ºç”± [Fiber åœ˜éšŠ](https://github.com/orgs/gofiber/people) ç¶­è­·ã€å­˜æ”¾åœ¨å¤–éƒ¨çš„ä¸­ä»‹æ¨¡çµ„ã€‚
